Package <Unnamed>

Interface Summary
ConverterInterface Converter for converting Binary to Hex, Hex to Binary, and Decimal to Hex.
DirectiveTableInterface  
EncoderInterface holds all the methods to encode the different instruction types and produce the intermediate file
ErrorDataInterface A handler for the types of errors we find in the source code, and the data
that it involves.
ErrorOutInterface Master list of all errors found in the given source code and all data
relative to them, represented in an array.
ErrorTableInterface  
InSourceCodeInterface  
InstructTableInterface  
IntermediateFileInterface IntermediateFileInterface holds the intermediate data output by the parser and outputs it to a file.
ObjectFileInterface  
SourceCodeParserInterface The parser takes a tokenized line at a time, checks the second token for syntactical correctness with one of our 5 types of operations (R,J,I,S,IO).
SymbolInterface The representation of the Symbols, represented by a String named label,
an Int named location representing the location in memory, and boolean
named usage representing how it is used.
SymbolTableInterface The representation of our symbol table, represented by an array of Symbols.
UserReportInterface  
 

Class Summary
AssemblerMain  
Converter OpConverter takes a line of source code in a number format, and converts
it into the requested format, that is, binary, hexadecimal, or decimal.
DirectiveTable  
Encoder holds all the methods to encode the different instruction types and produce the intermediate file
ErrorData SmallErrorData contains the necessary components of an Error and stores them in private fields.
ErrorOut SmallErrorOut lists all of the SmallErrorData objects inside of an array
for ease of access and printing error messages on correct lines.
ErrorTable  
InSourceCode  
InstructTable  
IntermediateFile  
ObjectFile  
SourceCodeParser  
Symbol Contains all necessary data about a symbol for the symbol table, as represented by a label, a location, a length, and a usage type.
SymbolTable A sortable symbol table as represented by an arraylist of symbols.
Tokenizer Class that implements the TokenizerInterface.
UserReport
